review: This thing works awesome. We bring it travelling so we can access Netflix on the road (and, when you're travelling with kids, that's a necessity).  You can only stream it when you are using the Google Chrome browser, so that's a tiny bit inconvenient in the Apple universe, but only a hiccup, really.  We also take it to Grandma's for the same reason.  We actually kept an old Samsung phone with a cracked screen that's sole job is to run Netflix on the Chromecast :)
author: Lorien Wallace
